actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act with respect to the potential addition of the Piedra River in Colorado to provide that the tributaries and head-waters of such river shall not be designated for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to exclude as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic River System those headwaters and tributaries of the Piedra River, Colorado, which are on national forest lands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act with respect to the potential addition of the Piedra River in Colorado to provide that the tributaries and head-waters of such river shall not be designated for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.
